snippet: Two longtime opponents of the U.S. gay-rights movement on Friday announced formation of a coalition that will seek to persuade more countries around the world to follow Russia's example in passing laws that restrict gay rights....

headline.print_headline: US Conservatives Praise Russia's Anti-Gay Laws
headline.main: US Conservatives Praise Russia's Anti-Gay Laws

lead_paragraph: Two longtime opponents of the U.S. gay-rights movement on Friday announced formation of a coalition that will seek to persuade more countries around the world to follow Russia's example in passing laws that restrict gay rights.
